carrotscr:clean

Full name:

com.carrotgarden.maven:carrot-maven-scr-plugin:1.1.4-SNAPSHOT:clean

Description:

clean component descriptors from outputDirectorySCR

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: clean.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
excludedServices Set - collection of names of unwanted component service interfaces
Default value is: java.lang.Cloneable.
improperPackaging Set - collection of names of unwanted maven project packaging types for which to skip invocation of this plugin;
Default value is: pom.
isIncludeEmptyDescriptor boolean - should include an empty component descriptor?
Default value is: true.
isIncludeGeneratedDescritors boolean - should generated descriptor resource files be included in final bundle?
Default value is: true.
isProcessMainClasses boolean - should "main" classes be processed?
Default value is: true.
isProcessTestClasses boolean - should "test" classes be processed?
Default value is: false.
outputExtensionSCR String - default extension used for generated scr component descriptor files
Default value is: xml.
outputMainClasses File - location of compiled "main" class files
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}.
outputTestClasses File - location of compiled "test" class files
Default value is: ${project.build.testOutputDirectory}.
targetDirectorySCR String - location of generated scr component descriptor files in final bundle
Default value is: OSGI-INF/service-component.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
eclipseSettings Map - map of key/value settings for eclipse m2e scr connector

Parameter Details

eclipseSettings:

map of key/value settings for eclipse m2e scr connector
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: No

excludedServices:

collection of names of unwanted component service interfaces
  • Type: java.util.Set
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: java.lang.Cloneable

improperPackaging:

collection of names of unwanted maven project packaging types for which to skip invocation of this plugin;
  • Type: java.util.Set
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: pom

isIncludeEmptyDescriptor:

should include an empty component descriptor?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: true

isIncludeGeneratedDescritors:

should generated descriptor resource files be included in final bundle?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: true

isProcessMainClasses:

should "main" classes be processed?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: true

isProcessTestClasses:

should "test" classes be processed?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: false

outputExtensionSCR:

default extension used for generated scr component descriptor files
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: xml

outputMainClasses:

location of compiled "main" class files
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.outputDirectory}

outputTestClasses:

location of compiled "test" class files
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.testOutputDirectory}

targetDirectorySCR:

location of generated scr component descriptor files in final bundle
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: OSGI-INF/service-component
